metadata.title: Wednesday, 3rd July, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) how many kilometres of feeder roads, out of the national target of 10,000 kilometres are earmarked for:
(i) Kasenengwa District; (ii) Chipata District; and (iii) Eastern Province;
(b) what the names of the roads in Kasenengwa District are; and
(a) why lecturers under the Technical Education, Vocational and Entrepreneurship Training (TEVET) institutions were removed from the Government payroll; and
(b) whether the TEVET institutions have the capacity to meet the lecturersâ€™ remunerations.
